00169 {
00170   // Find base addresses.  This module has separate A16 (for configuration) 
00171   // and A32 (for data memory) address regions.  The A16 address is set by
00172   // jumpers while the A32 is programmed by a register accessed through the
00173   // A16 space.
00174   d->a16_base = odb_get_word ("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/%s/a16 base address",
00175                               crate_number, d->odb_name);
00176   d->a32_base = odb_get_dword ("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/%s/a32 base address",
00177                               crate_number, d->odb_name);
00178 
00179   // Get VME handles to access module
00180   struct vme_mapping_ctrl a16_mapping = {
00181           VMEMAP_DWIDTH_32,
00182           VMEMAP_ASPACE_A16,
00183           VMEMAP_SUPUSERAM_SUPER,
00184           VMEMAP_PRGDATAAM_DATA
00185   };
00186   d->a16_handle = vme_open(d->a16_base, a16_mapping, 0x100, 0);
00187 
00188   struct vme_mapping_ctrl a32_mapping = {
00189           VMEMAP_DWIDTH_32,
00190           VMEMAP_ASPACE_A32,
00191           VMEMAP_SUPUSERAM_USER,
00192           VMEMAP_PRGDATAAM_DATA
00193   };
00194   d->a32_handle = vme_open(d->a32_base, a32_mapping, 4096, 0);
00195 
00196   // Set up the A32 base address
00197   vme_write_d16 (d->a16_handle, d->a16_base | DL401_BASE, d->a32_base >> 16);
00198 
00199   // Set up the address modifiers
00200   vme_write_d16 (d->a16_handle, d->a16_base | DL401_MASK, 
00201                  DL401_LWIOENA | DL401_AM_EXT_MODE);
00202 
00203   // Set the default mode bits
00204   vme_write_d16 (d->a16_handle, d->a16_base | DL401_MODE, DL401_DEFMODE);
00205 
00206   // find and set pedestals
00207   WORD ped[DL401_NCHAN];
00208   for (int k = 0; k < DL401_NCHAN; k++)
00209     {
00210       ped[k] = odb_get_word ("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/%s/Pedestal",
00211                              crate_number, d->odb_name);
00212     }
00213   dl401_setPedestals (d, ped, DL401_NCHAN);
00214 
00215   // standard reset and clear
00216   dl401_reset (d);
00217   dl401_clear (d);
00218 
00219   diag_print(2, "dl401_bor1  a32_base=0x%08lx a16_base=0x%08lx\n",
00220           d->a32_base, d->a16_base);
00221 
00222   return SUCCESS;
00223 }

00231   // compute word to write to pedestal DAC 
00232   DWORD parPed = 0;
00233   for (int i = 0; i < np; i++) {
00234       parPed |= (u_long) (p[i] & DL401_PEDCHANMASK) << (i * DL401_PEDCHANBITS);
00235   }
00236   parPed &= DL401_PEDMASK;
00237   diag_print (2, "dl401_setPedestal: [%d] 0%08lo (", d, parPed);
00238

00241                  DL401_DEFMODE & DL401_DACWENA);
00242 
00243   // shift bits into DAC one at a time; it's a serial interface
00244   for (int i = 0; i < DL401_PEDBITS; i++)
00245     {
00246       u_short bit =
00247         ((parPed << i) & DL401_PEDBITMASK) >> (DL401_PEDBITS - 1);
00248       vme_write_d16 (d->a16_handle, d->a16_base | DL401_WDAC, bit & 0x0001);
00249       diag_print (2, "%1x", bit);
00250     }
00251 
00252   // disable writing to DAC
00253   vme_write_d16 (d->a16_handle, d->a16_base | DL401_MODE,
00254                  DL401_DEFMODE | DL401_DACWDIS);
00255   diag_print (2, ")\n");
00256 
00257   return SUCCESS;
